page_description: Main landing page featuring a hero section with Nightingale's portrait, brief introduction, and navigation menu to other sections. Includes responsive design and mobile-friendly navigation.
Interactive timeline showing at least 10 key events in Nightingale's life from 1820-1910. Features vertical scrolling timeline with event cards containing dates, descriptions, and optional images.
Responsive image gallery featuring at least 15 historical photos, manuscripts, and related images. Includes image captions and optional lightbox functionality for enlarged viewing.
Collection of at least 20 famous quotes by Nightingale, displayed in card format with sources and context. May include categorization and filtering options.

Comprehensive article (2000-3000 words) detailing Nightingale's influence on modern nursing, including sections on education, hospital management, public health, ethics, statistics, and international influence. Features supporting images and references.
